entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 6:58 PM EST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:58 PM EST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. A few flurries beginning in the evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 6:58 PM EST Saturday 11 March 2023
